page.description: Specify the width (using CSS syntax) for the scrollable Grid body section.
page.important: If your columns do not look properly aligned, it is possible that your Grid is too wide for the specified width. If the width is '100%' try using an explicit width (e.g. 6in). If you are already using an explicit width, try increasing the width.
